p: Hajimehdipooret al. [ 123] extracted the SLs from the Inula oculus-christi and I. aucheriana (Family-Compositae) and evaluated their capability of inhibiting AChE activity by using the Ellman assay method. It was observed that out of the three evaluated compounds, the Gaillardin ( 36) was the most versatile secondary metabolites (IC 50 for AChE 729 Î¼M) present in the plants and can be investigated for further AD studies.
